Definitely play the first Portal game for the story if you wanna catch up on that. If you start with this one, it is a great start with puzzle solving. There are some cool easter eggs and lore secrets within the game, so be on the lookout for them!

Probably one of the best games ever. Great visuals, great characters, great gameplay. Perpetual Testing Initiative gives this game an almost endless amount of replay value.

Portal é um jogo sensacional, do começo ao fim super conveniente e sem buracos na história, é claro que, acho que todos nós gostariamos de saber o que aconteceu com a Chell depois disso tudo, nem se fosse uma pequena DLC, mas, como sempre, a Valve não sabe contar até 3, enfim, infelizmente não tive a oportunidade de jogar o modo COOP até terminar, mas o pouco que joguei ja me agradou muito, Portal é um dos meus jogos favoritos e sempre vai ficar marcado no meu coração.
Słyszałem wiele dobrego o tej grze i w końcu się za nią wziąłem, to było coś niesamowitego.
As a psychopathic mute myself I can relate

This is one of my favorite games of all time, and probably my absolute favorite puzzle game. To be honest, I think everyone should play this game. I played it back on the Xbox 360 and now I'm playing it here. The storyline is amazing, the humor is actually great, and of course the puzzles are engaging and just the right amount of challenging. If you haven't played this game, what are you even doing, go play it.
A must-have for anyone's Steam Library. An incredibly solid, yet quite short, puzzle game. Do you really have a Steam account if you don't have Portal?
Possibly the worst sequel to any form of media in existence
this game banging no cap but id get portal 1 and finish it before doing this very good yes
Played it a few years back. What a great puzzling game. Totally recommend this.
